attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: School half term holidays are no longer suitable for 21st century families. For children they provide a week of boredom which could be used more effectively doing school activities or even conducting community or social projects off curriculum. For lone parents and families with two working parents they are an incovenience and cause additional workplace stress through the need to take leave or provide short term childcare
